abstract: Helped by lower provisions for bad loans, the British bank Barclays reported on Monday that profit increased 5 percent in the third quarter, to $2.1 billion.
snippet: Helped by lower provisions for bad loans, the British bank Barclays reported on Monday that profit increased 5 percent in the third quarter, to $2.1 billion.

headline.main: Barclays Profit Rose 5% in Third Quarter
